CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Lithiation of alkylated thiophene followed by quenching with tri-butyltin chloride afforded tri-butyl(4alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane ( 10-13 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| alkylated thiophene |
| tri-butylstannane |
| tri-butyl(4-alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane (10-13) |
| tri-butyltin chloride |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| alkylated thiophene |
| tri-butyl(4-alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane (10-13) |
| tri-butyltin chloride |

Note: In the original paragraph, "lithiation of alkylated thiophene" could be considered a process or reaction, but since the paragraph is asking for material names, it is included as "alkylated thiophene" in the table. Similarly, "followed by quenching" is a process, but the material being quenched is "tri-butyl(4-alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane (10-13)".

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Lithiation of alkylated thiophene followed by quenching with tri-butyltin chloride afforded tri-butyl(4alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane ( 10-13 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| alkylated thiophene |
| tri-butylstannane |
| tri-butyl(4-alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane (10-13) |
| lithiation |
| quenching |
| tri-butyltin chloride |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| alkylated thiophene |
| tri-butyl(4-alkylthiophene-2-yl)stannane (10-13) |
| lithiation process |
| quenching with tri-butyltin chloride |

Explanation:

* "followed by" and "afforded" are not material properties.
* "tri-butyltin chloride" is a reagent, but it can be considered a material in this context as it is being used in the synthesis of a new material.
